metadata.subject: INTERACTIVE: Where does Donald Trump's money come from?

locations: 575 Lexington Avenue 4th Floor, New York, NY 10022

relationships.description: Richard Kahn is sending an article about Donald Trump's finances to Jeffrey E.

analysis.purpose: To share a news article analyzing Donald Trump's financial sources
analysis.significance: Document shows interest in Trump's financial background shortly after his election victory

blackmail_indicators.description: No indicators of blackmail or coercion present - appears to be straightforward sharing of public information

illegal_activity.description: Document contains a shared news article about Donald Trump's finances - no first-hand illegal activity discussed

details: Sharing article from therealdeal.com about Donald Trump's financial sources

public_knowledge.context: This email was sent shortly after Donald Trump's election victory in November 2016, when there was significant media interest in his financial background and business dealings

analysis.summary: Richard Kahn sends Jeffrey E. a news article from The Real Deal analyzing where Donald Trump's money comes from, marked as high importance shortly after Trump's 2016 election victory.
